channel.title: mom on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in mom on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Valentine's Day Gift
item.description: This valentine's day she was very happy. She has been with me for quite long time now; I had never seen her so happy and excited in before. As I type this post she is on call and I can clearly hear her sharing it with her sister and this is her third call! :o) Though she'd never tell me, I always knew that she wanted it. She is very interested in stitching, embroidery, and other creative stuff which mainly deals with fabric.
